description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争期间，中国人民志愿军与联合国军在云山郡附近发生的一场战斗，是中国人民志愿军第一次战役的一部分，也是中美两国军队在朝鲜战场上的首次交锋。
description.en: A battle fought between the Chinese People's Volunteer Army and United Nations forces near Unsan County during the Korean War. It was part of the Chinese First Phase Offensive and marked the first direct combat engagement between Chinese and U.S. forces in Korea.

description.zh-cn: 一场始于1950年的军事冲突，一方是朝鲜民主主义人民共和国及其盟友，另一方是大韩民国及其盟友（主要是联合国军）。
description.en: A military conflict that began in 1950, pitting the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and its allies against the Republic of Korea and its allies (primarily the United Nations Command).

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在朝鲜战争中派遣的武装力量，由中国人民解放军的部队组成。
description.en: The armed forces deployed by the People's Republic of China during the Korean War, composed of units from the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 由联合国授权，以美国为首的多国部队，旨在支援韩国抵抗朝鲜的入侵。
description.en: A multinational military force authorized by the United Nations and led by the United States, established to support South Korea against the North Korean invasion.

description.zh-cn: 联合国军的主要参与国，提供了绝大部分的军事力量。
description.en: The primary participant in the United Nations Command, providing the vast majority of its military forces.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争中的主要参战方之一，与朝鲜民主主义人民共和国对立。
description.en: One of the main belligerents in the Korean War, opposing the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国元帅，在云山战斗期间担任中国人民志愿军司令员。
description.en: Marshal of the People's Republic of China, who served as the commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，在云山战斗期间担任中国人民志愿军第39军军长。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the commander of the PVA 39th Corps during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军中将，在云山战斗期间担任中国人民志愿军第40军军长。
description.en: Lieutenant General of the People's Liberation Army, who served as the commander of the PVA 40th Corps during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军中将，在云山战斗期间担任美国第1军司令。
description.en: Lieutenant General in the United States Army, commander of the U.S. I Corps during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军少将，在云山战斗期间担任美军第1骑兵师师长。
description.en: Major General in the United States Army, commander of the U.S. 1st Cavalry Division during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军军官，云山战斗期间联合国军指挥官之一。
description.en: An officer of the United States Army, one of the UN commanders during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 韩国将军，在云山战斗期间担任韩国第1步兵师师长。
description.en: A South Korean general who commanded the ROK 1st Infantry Division during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 韩国将军，云山战斗期间联合国军指挥官之一。
description.en: A South Korean general, one of the UN commanders during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 韩国军官，在云山战斗期间担任韩国第1步兵师第12团团长。
description.en: A South Korean officer who commanded the 12th Regiment of the ROK 1st Infantry Division during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 韩国军官，云山战斗期间联合国军指挥官之一。
description.en: A South Korean officer, one of the UN commanders during the Battle of Unsan.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第39集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第39集团军
en: 39th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军的主力部队之一，在云山战斗中担任主攻。
description.en: One of the main forces of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, which served as the main attacking force in the Battle of Unsan.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军合成第一一五旅

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军合成第一一五旅

description.zh-cn: 隶属于中国人民志愿军第39军的师级单位，参与了云山战斗。
description.en: A division-level unit of the PVA 39th Corps that participated in the Battle of Unsan.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军合成第一一六旅

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军合成第一一六旅

description.zh-cn: 隶属于中国人民志愿军第39军的师级单位，参与了云山战斗。
description.en: A division-level unit of the PVA 39th Corps that participated in the Battle of Unsan.

nodes.id: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

zh-cn: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队

description.zh-cn: 原为中国人民志愿军第40军下辖的第120师，在云山战斗中归第39军指挥。
description.en: Formerly the 120th Division of the PVA 40th Corps, it was placed under the command of the 39th Corps during the Battle of Unsan.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十集团军
en: 40th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军的参战部队之一，其下属第120师参与了云山战斗。
description.en: One of the participating units of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army; its subordinate 120th Division took part in the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军的一支师级部队，在云山战斗中遭受了严重损失。
description.en: A division-level unit of the United States Army that suffered heavy losses in the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 韩国陆军的一支师级部队，是云山战斗中首个与中国人民志愿军交战的联合国军部队。
description.en: A division-level unit of the Republic of Korea Army, it was the first UN force to engage the Chinese People's Volunteer Army in the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 位于朝鲜平安北道的一个郡，是云山战斗的发生地。
description.en: A county in North Pyongan Province, North Korea, and the location of the Battle of Unsan.

nodes.id: 第一次战役 (中国人民志愿军)

zh-cn: 第一次战役 (中国人民志愿军)

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军入朝后发动的首次大规模进攻行动，旨在稳定战线并试探联合国军。
description.en: The first large-scale offensive launched by the Chinese People's Volunteer Army after entering Korea, aimed at stabilizing the front line and probing UN forces.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于美军第1骑兵师的团级部队，在云山战斗中遭到中国人民志愿军的突袭，损失惨重。
description.en: A regimental unit of the U.S. 1st Cavalry Division, which was ambushed by the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Battle of Unsan and suffered devastating losses.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 二战后美苏在朝鲜半岛划分受降范围的军事分界线，后来成为朝韩之间的事实边界。
description.en: The military demarcation line used by the US and USSR to divide their zones of occupation on the Korean Peninsula after WWII, which later became the de facto border between North and South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国与朝鲜民主主义人民共和国之间的边界。
description.en: The border between the People's Republic of China and the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 位于中朝边境的河流。
description.en: A river on the border between China and North Korea.

description.zh-cn: 联合国军总司令麦克阿瑟发动的旨在结束朝鲜战争的总攻势。
description.en: A general offensive launched by UN Commander Douglas MacArthur intended to end the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军的一支军级单位，在朝鲜战争中指挥了包括美军和韩军在内的多个师。
description.en: A corps-level unit of the United States Army that commanded several divisions, including both U.S. and ROK units, during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 位于鸭绿江上的水库，是联合国军的战略目标之一。
description.en: A reservoir on the Yalu River, which was one of the strategic objectives for UN forces.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要缔造者和第一代最高领导人，决定派遣中国人民志愿军进入朝鲜参战。
description.en: The principal founder and first supreme leader of the People's Republic of China, who decided to send the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to fight in Korea.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要武装力量，其部队被改编为中国人民志愿军参加了朝鲜战争。
description.en: The primary armed forces of the People's Republic of China, whose units were reorganized as the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to participate in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一支部队，后被改组为中国人民志愿军的主体。
description.en: A unit of the People's Liberation Army that was later reorganized to form the core of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army.

description.zh-cn: 韩国陆军的一支师级部队，在云山战斗及温井战斗中被中国人民志愿军击溃。
description.en: A division-level unit of the Republic of Korea Army, which was defeated by the Chinese People's Volunteer Army in the battles of Unsan and Onjong.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军的一支师级部队，在云山战斗期间部署于韩国第1师的左翼。
description.en: A division-level unit of the United States Army, deployed on the left flank of the ROK 1st Division during the Battle of Unsan.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第38集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第38集团军
en: 38th Group Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军的参战部队之一，参与了第一次战役。
description.en: One of the participating units of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, which took part in the First Phase Offensive.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军第42集团军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第42集团军
en: 42nd Group Army of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军的参战部队之一，其下属一个师参与了第一次战役中对云山以东的攻击。
description.en: One of the participating units of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army; one of its divisions participated in the attack east of Unsan during the First Phase Offensive.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争第一次战役中的一场战斗，中国人民志愿军在此重创韩国国军。
description.en: A battle during the First Phase Offensive of the Korean War, where the Chinese People's Volunteer Army heavily defeated ROK forces.

nodes.id: 大韩民国第8机械化步兵师

zh-cn: 大韩民国第8机械化步兵师

description.zh-cn: 韩国陆军的一支师级部队，在温井战斗中其第10团被击溃。
description.en: A division-level unit of the Republic of Korea Army, whose 10th Regiment was defeated in the Battle of Onjong.

description.zh-cn: 韩国军官，在云山战斗期间担任韩国第1步兵师第15团团长。
description.en: A South Korean officer who commanded the 15th Regiment of the ROK 1st Infantry Division during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军上将，在云山战斗期间担任美国第8军团司令。
description.en: A general in the United States Army who commanded the Eighth United States Army during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军在朝鲜战争中的主要地面作战司令部。
description.en: The main ground combat command of the United States Army in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 派遣中国人民志愿军参加朝鲜战争的国家。
description.en: The country that dispatched the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to participate in the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于中国人民志愿军第39军的师级单位，从东北方向主攻云山。
description.en: A division-level unit of the PVA 39th Corps, which led the main attack on Unsan from the northeast.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于美军第1骑兵师的团级部队，在云山战斗中曾尝试营救被困的第8骑兵团第3营。
description.en: A regimental unit of the U.S. 1st Cavalry Division, which attempted to rescue the trapped 3rd Battalion of the 8th Cavalry Regiment during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军五星上将，朝鲜战争期间的联合国军总司令。
description.en: A five-star general of the United States Army and the Commander-in-Chief of the United Nations Command during the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争第二次战役中在西线发生的一场关键战役，导致联合国军的重大失败。
description.en: A key battle on the western front during the Second Phase Offensive of the Korean War, which resulted in a major defeat for the UN forces.

description.zh-cn: 朝鲜战争第二次战役中在东线发生的一场决定性战役。
description.en: A decisive battle on the eastern front during the Second Phase Offensive of the Korean War.

description.zh-cn: 云山战斗是朝鲜战争期间发生的一场战斗。
description.en: The Battle of Unsan was a battle that took place during the Korean War.

relationships.source: 第一次战役 (中国人民志愿军)

description.zh-cn: 云山战斗是中国人民志愿军第一次战役的一部分。
description.en: The Battle of Unsan was part of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army's First Phase Offensive.

description.zh-cn: 云山战斗以中国人民志愿军获胜告终，这次胜利缓解了中国领导层对干预朝鲜战争的担忧，并为后续战役提供了经验。
description.en: The Battle of Unsan ended in a victory for the Chinese People's Volunteer Army, which eased the Chinese leadership's concerns about intervening in the war and provided experience for subsequent campaigns.

description.zh-cn: 在云山战斗中，联合国军，特别是美军第8骑兵团，遭受了毁灭性的损失。
description.en: During the Battle of Unsan, the UN forces, particularly the U.S. 8th Cavalry Regiment, suffered devastating losses.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军是云山战斗的发起方和主要参战方之一。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was an initiator and one of the main combatants in the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 联合国军是云山战斗的主要参战方之一。
description.en: The United Nations Command was one of the main combatants in the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 彭德怀在云山战斗期间担任中国人民志愿军司令员。
description.en: Peng Dehuai served as the commander of the Chinese People's Volunteer Army during the Battle of Unsan.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第39集团军

description.zh-cn: 吴信泉在云山战斗期间担任第39军军长。
description.en: Wu Xinquan served as the commander of the 39th Corps during the Battle of Unsan.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十集团军

description.zh-cn: 温玉成在云山战斗期间担任第40军军长。
description.en: Wen Yucheng served as the commander of the 40th Corps during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 弗兰克·米尔本在云山战斗期间担任美国第1军司令。
description.en: Frank W. Milburn served as the commander of the U.S. I Corps during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 霍巴特·盖伊在云山战斗期间担任美军第1骑兵师师长。
description.en: Hobart R. Gay served as the commander of the U.S. 1st Cavalry Division during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 白善烨在云山战斗期间担任韩国第1步兵师师长。
description.en: Paik Sun-yup served as the commander of the ROK 1st Infantry Division during the Battle of Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 金点坤在云山战斗期间担任韩国第1步兵师第12团团长。
description.en: Kim Jeom-gon served as the commander of the 12th Regiment of the ROK 1st Infantry Division during the Battle of Unsan.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第39集团军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军第39军是参与云山战斗的主力部队。
description.en: The PVA 39th Corps was the main force participating in the Battle of Unsan.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军合成第一一五旅
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第39集团军

description.zh-cn: 115师是中国人民解放军第39军的下属部队。
description.en: The 115th Division was a subordinate unit of the PLA 39th Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军陆军合成第一一六旅
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第39集团军

description.zh-cn: 116师是中国人民解放军第39军的下属部队。
description.en: The 116th Division was a subordinate unit of the PLA 39th Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军陆军第四十集团军

description.zh-cn: 120师原隶属于中国人民解放军第40军。
description.en: The 120th Division was originally subordinate to the PLA 40th Corps.

relationships.source: 中国人民武装警察部队第一机动总队
relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第39集团军

description.zh-cn: 在云山战斗期间，原属40军的120师归39军指挥。
description.en: During the Battle of Unsan, the 120th Division, originally from the 40th Corps, was placed under the command of the 39th Corps.

description.zh-cn: 美国陆军第8骑兵团是美军第1骑兵师的下属部队。
description.en: The 8th Cavalry Regiment is a subordinate unit of the U.S. 1st Cavalry Division.

description.zh-cn: 1950年10月25日，中国人民志愿军在云山附近开始攻击韩国第1步兵师。
description.en: On October 25, 1950, the Chinese People's Volunteer Army began attacking the ROK 1st Infantry Division near Unsan.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军第39集团军

description.zh-cn: 1950年11月1日，志愿军第39军在云山攻击了美军第8骑兵团，造成其毁灭性损失。
description.en: On November 1, 1950, the PVA 39th Corps attacked the U.S. 8th Cavalry Regiment at Unsan, causing it devastating losses.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东下令将中国人民解放军东北边防军改组为中国人民志愿军，以出兵朝鲜半岛。
description.en: Mao Zedong ordered the reorganization of the PLA Northeast Border Defense Force into the Chinese People's Volunteer Army to intervene in the Korean Peninsula.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军由东北边防军改组而成。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army was formed through the reorganization of the Northeast Border Defense Force.

relationships.target: 第一次战役 (中国人民志愿军)

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东批准实施第一次战役，对韩国军队进行有限的进攻行动。
description.en: Mao Zedong approved the First Phase Offensive, a limited offensive operation against South Korean forces.

description.zh-cn: 美国第1军司令弗兰克·米尔本要求韩国第1步兵师通过云山，进攻鸭绿江上的水丰水库。
description.en: I Corps commander Frank W. Milburn ordered the ROK 1st Infantry Division to advance through Unsan and capture the Sui-ho Dam on the Yalu River.

description.zh-cn: 美国第8军团司令沃尔顿·沃克命令美军第1骑兵师辖下的第8骑兵团去替换韩国第12团。
description.en: Eighth Army commander Walton Walker ordered the 8th Cavalry Regiment of the U.S. 1st Cavalry Division to relieve the ROK 12th Regiment.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民志愿军在云山以东击溃了韩国第6师。
description.en: The Chinese People's Volunteer Army routed the ROK 6th Division east of Unsan.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军第39集团军

description.zh-cn: 1950年11月1日，中国人民志愿军司令彭德怀下令第39军继续前进以消灭在云山的驻军。
description.en: On November 1, 1950, PVA commander Peng Dehuai ordered the 39th Corps to advance and destroy the garrison at Unsan.

description.zh-cn: 志愿军第115师下属的第343团在喇叭山截击了试图前去营救的美军第5骑兵团。
description.en: The 343rd Regiment of the PVA 115th Division intercepted the U.S. 5th Cavalry Regiment at Bugle Hill during its rescue attempt.

description.zh-cn: 美军第1骑兵师师长霍巴特·盖伊因第5骑兵团伤亡惨重而命令其撤退，中止了营救行动。
description.en: Due to heavy casualties, 1st Cavalry Division commander Hobart R. Gay ordered the 5th Cavalry Regiment to withdraw, halting the rescue operation.

description.zh-cn: 联合国军总司令道格拉斯·麦克阿瑟不顾云山的战败，发动了旨在结束战争的“圣诞节回家攻势”（即感恩节攻势）。
description.en: UN Commander Douglas MacArthur, ignoring the disaster at Unsan, launched the 'Home-by-Christmas Offensive' (also known as the Thanksgiving Offensive) to end the war.

description.zh-cn: 联合国军的感恩节攻势直接导致了其后在清川江的决定性战役。
description.en: The UN's Thanksgiving Offensive led directly to the subsequent decisive battle at the Ch'ongch'on River.

description.zh-cn: 联合国军的感恩节攻势直接导致了其后在长津湖的决定性战役。
description.en: The UN's Thanksgiving Offensive led directly to the subsequent decisive battle at the Chosin Reservoir.

description.zh-cn: 在云山战斗期间，韩国第1步兵师配属在美国第1军的指挥下。
description.en: During the Battle of Unsan, the ROK 1st Infantry Division was attached to and under the command of the U.S. I Corps.
